abstract: Daimler, the German carmaker, dismissed market talk on Tuesday it could divest its Maybach super luxury brand, after Chinese media reported that a Chinese firm was considering buying the brand.
snippet: Daimler, the German carmaker, dismissed market talk on Tuesday it could divest its Maybach super luxury brand, after Chinese media reported that a Chinese firm was considering buying the brand.
lead_paragraph: Daimler, the German carmaker, dismissed market talk on Tuesday that it could divest its Maybach super luxury brand, after Chinese media reported that a Chinese company was considering buying it.

headline.main: Daimler Denies Talk of Maybach Sale
